website_summaries.verdict: Close-fitting helmet that’s lightweight and suitable for competition.
pros: Comfortable fit that’s easily adjustable via a dial at the back
High-flow vents improve air circulation while the Coolmax liner is a great addition – it can be removed for washing, so no more sweaty helmets
The clip and buckle stays off the face for a better profile
cons: The removable visor is flimsy and breaks off easily

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from a likely skull fracture
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is a true blessing! I was riding my horse on a popular wooded trail that we'd ridden many times before. He got spooked and I FLEW off, landed on my right hip and SLAMMED my head back onto very dry, rocky soil. My head actually hit two rocks so hard it chipped the coating on this helmet. Here's the best part: ZERO head trauma or pain afterwards! (My back was totally out of whack, but my head was 100% PROTECTED!) This is the BEST HELMET you can buy! I'm about to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Guilliams

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this helmet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this helmet. I ordered it first in S/M and it was too tight and the M/L was a bit too big. I have a small, oval face and this helmet (like most) looked like an oversized pail on my head. I think the black/brown color combo was very nice. I did return it because I want a well fitting helmet. I don't want to wear one, but I know I should. I did try on two different Ovation helmets and 1 of 3 did fit in the S/M size - so sizing varies from one to another.... thankfully Amazon allows us to return easily.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie J. Longhini

customer_reviews.title: Great Inexpensive riding helmet
customer_reviews.text: When I started taking riding lessons at age 56, I wasn't sure I would be able to stick with it. So I bought a cheap helmet which served me well. Now it's been 3 years and I'm still taking lessons and even competed in my first introductory dressage competition. Thought I deserved something a little nicer. Tried this helmet for less than $80 and love it. Can't believe what a difference! It fits me so well and is so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceMom125

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the attached visor
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is great. I love the look, it’s low profile but also effective. One thing I need to point out is that the visor came off when I put it on my head for the first time and I had a really hard time fitting the end back into the hole. It seems like the connecting part was very flimsy. My boyfriend was able to fix it for me and it held up fine on my ride yesterday. Other than that, the helmet is perfect. Fits my head perfectly and adjusts to a nice snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Love this helmet!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Ovation Extreme Helmet! Several reviews have stated the helmet runs small, but I felt as though it fit just as the sizing chart said it should. I wear a 7 1/8" and ordered a medium/large. The helmet is lightweight and super comfortable. Easy to adjust with the dial at the back. The dial does not dig into your head or anything - I didn't even notice it at all after making the adjustment. Rode with it recently on a 90 degree+ day with high humidity and did not get hot! I have a Troxel and Tipperary helmet as well and this Ovation is by far my favorite.

product_meta.title: Ovation Unisex Extreme Riding Helmet
product_meta.description:
OVATION UNISEX EXTREME RIDING HELMET

The Extreme Helmet by Ovation is a lightweight low-profile design featuring in-mold design and an easy-adjust dial for a custom fit. 
Stainless steel air vents and a removeable Coolmax liner provide excellent ventilation and easy maintenance. 
Matte finish with carbon fiber accents.

OVATION HELMETS

Ovation riding helmets come in styles for use in schooling or in the show ring. All our Ovation riding helmets are certified to ASTM or SEI ASTM standards. 
Ovation riding helmets have low profiles, are lightweight, with many having features that allow for ventilation as well as sweat absorbtion. 
Because a good fit is important in a riding helmet, some Ovation riding helmets offer dial adjustment as well as harness adjuster clips. Many styles feature removable visors.
feature_bullets: Lightweight and low profile. Rubberized finish with carbon graphic print.
Stainless steel air vent mesh. Easy adjust dial. In-Mold design.
High flow vents. Rubberized finish with carbon graphic print.
Removable washable Coolmax liner. Removable breakaway visors.
Exclusive YKK adjuster clip and buckle. Certified to ASTM & CE standards
